# AVExperienceController.Configuration.Placement

**Structure**

A struct used to set the placement for the media playback to be experienced.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Placement
```

## Overview

Controls where an experience is placed. It can be over a UIScene.

## Type Properties

- **unspecified**: Used as default when no UIScene is specified as a placement.

## Type Methods

- **over(scene:)**: Place the video over the provided scene.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable

items.description: Used as default when no UIScene is specified as a placement.
items.name: unspecified

items.description: Place the video over the provided scene.
items.name: over(scene:)
